name: cron to register all NEs to webinar

parameters.query:
SELECT
  "public"."net_enquiry"."id" AS "id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."status" AS "status",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."created_by" AS "created_by",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."updated_by" AS "updated_by",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" AS "created_at",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."updated_at" AS "updated_at",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."first_name" AS "first_name",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."last_name" AS "last_name",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."phone" AS "phone",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."email" AS "email",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."city" AS "city",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."coming_from" AS "coming_from",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."gcl_id" AS "gcl_id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."whatsapp_opt_in" AS "whatsapp_opt_in",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."register_for_webinar" AS "register_for_webinar",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."intrested_to_work_in_us" AS "intrested_to_work_in_us",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."page_full_url" AS "page_full_url",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."url_page_path" AS "url_page_path",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."linkedin_url" AS "linkedin_url",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."isFromWelcomeBack" AS "isFromWelcomeBack",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."uuid" AS "uuid",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."program_id" AS "program_id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."campaign_id" AS "campaign_id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."educationQualificationId" AS "educationQualificationId",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."leadId" AS "leadId",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."country_code" AS "country_code",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."ne_type" AS "ne_type"
FROM
  "public"."net_enquiry"
WHERE
  (
    "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" >= timestamp with time zone '2025-03-26 00:00:00.000 +03:00'
  )
 
   AND (
    "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" < timestamp with time zone '2025-03-27 00:00:00.000 +03:00'
  )
ORDER BY
  "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" DESC
LIMIT
  1048575

SELECT
  "public"."webinar"."id" AS "id",
  "public"."webinar"."status" AS "status",
  "public"."webinar"."created_by" AS "created_by",
  "public"."webinar"."updated_by" AS "updated_by",
  "public"."webinar"."created_at" AS "created_at",
  "public"."webinar"."updated_at" AS "updated_at",
  "public"."webinar"."webinar_id" AS "webinar_id",
  "public"."webinar"."webinar_name" AS "webinar_name",
  "public"."webinar"."host" AS "host",
  "public"."webinar"."title_on_website" AS "title_on_website",
  "public"."webinar"."date_string" AS "date_string",
  "public"."webinar"."time_string" AS "time_string",
  "public"."webinar"."duration" AS "duration",
  "public"."webinar"."webinar_type" AS "webinar_type",
  "public"."webinar"."courseId" AS "courseId",
  "public"."webinar"."tagline_1" AS "tagline_1",
  "public"."webinar"."tagline_2" AS "tagline_2",
  "public"."webinar"."about" AS "about",
  "public"."webinar"."text_highlight" AS "text_highlight",
  "public"."webinar"."what_you_learn" AS "what_you_learn",
  "public"."webinar"."acc_city_id" AS "acc_city_id",
  "public"."webinar"."isOffline" AS "isOffline",
  "public"."webinar"."card_banner_image" AS "card_banner_image",
  "public"."webinar"."date_time" AS "date_time",
  "public"."webinar"."zoomAccount" AS "zoomAccount"
FROM
  "public"."webinar"
WHERE
  (
    "public"."webinar"."date_time" >= CAST((NOW() + INTERVAL '1 day') AS date)
  )
 
   AND (
    "public"."webinar"."date_time" < CAST((NOW() + INTERVAL '14 day') AS date)
  )

parameters.textBody: Run is finished for the day's NE.

parameters.query:
SELECT
  "public"."net_enquiry"."id" AS "id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."status" AS "status",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."created_by" AS "created_by",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."updated_by" AS "updated_by",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" AS "created_at",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."updated_at" AS "updated_at",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."first_name" AS "first_name",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."last_name" AS "last_name",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."phone" AS "phone",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."email" AS "email",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."city" AS "city",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."coming_from" AS "coming_from",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."gcl_id" AS "gcl_id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."whatsapp_opt_in" AS "whatsapp_opt_in",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."register_for_webinar" AS "register_for_webinar",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."intrested_to_work_in_us" AS "intrested_to_work_in_us",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."page_full_url" AS "page_full_url",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."url_page_path" AS "url_page_path",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."linkedin_url" AS "linkedin_url",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."isFromWelcomeBack" AS "isFromWelcomeBack",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."uuid" AS "uuid",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."program_id" AS "program_id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."campaign_id" AS "campaign_id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."educationQualificationId" AS "educationQualificationId",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."leadId" AS "leadId",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."country_code" AS "country_code",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."ne_type" AS "ne_type"
FROM
  "public"."net_enquiry"
WHERE
  (
    "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" >= CAST(
      CAST((NOW() + INTERVAL '-1 day') AS date) AS timestamptz
    )
  )
 
   AND (
    "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" < CAST(CAST(NOW() AS date) AS timestamptz)
  )
LIMIT
  1048575

SELECT
  "public"."net_enquiry"."id" AS "id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."status" AS "status",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."created_by" AS "created_by",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."updated_by" AS "updated_by",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" AS "created_at",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."updated_at" AS "updated_at",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."first_name" AS "first_name",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."last_name" AS "last_name",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."phone" AS "phone",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."email" AS "email",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."city" AS "city",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."coming_from" AS "coming_from",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."gcl_id" AS "gcl_id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."whatsapp_opt_in" AS "whatsapp_opt_in",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."register_for_webinar" AS "register_for_webinar",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."intrested_to_work_in_us" AS "intrested_to_work_in_us",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."page_full_url" AS "page_full_url",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."url_page_path" AS "url_page_path",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."linkedin_url" AS "linkedin_url",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."isFromWelcomeBack" AS "isFromWelcomeBack",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."uuid" AS "uuid",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."program_id" AS "program_id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."campaign_id" AS "campaign_id",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."educationQualificationId" AS "educationQualificationId",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."leadId" AS "leadId",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."country_code" AS "country_code",
  "public"."net_enquiry"."ne_type" AS "ne_type"
FROM
  "public"."net_enquiry"
WHERE
  (
    "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" >= CAST(
      CAST((NOW() + INTERVAL '-1 day') AS date) AS timestamptz
    )
  )
 
   AND (
    "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" < CAST(CAST(NOW() AS date) AS timestamptz)
  )
order by "public"."net_enquiry"."created_at" desc

SELECT
  "public"."webinar"."id" AS "id",
  "public"."webinar"."status" AS "status",
  "public"."webinar"."created_by" AS "created_by",
  "public"."webinar"."updated_by" AS "updated_by",
  "public"."webinar"."created_at" AS "created_at",
  "public"."webinar"."updated_at" AS "updated_at",
  "public"."webinar"."webinar_id" AS "webinar_id",
  "public"."webinar"."webinar_name" AS "webinar_name",
  "public"."webinar"."host" AS "host",
  "public"."webinar"."title_on_website" AS "title_on_website",
  "public"."webinar"."date_string" AS "date_string",
  "public"."webinar"."time_string" AS "time_string",
  "public"."webinar"."duration" AS "duration",
  "public"."webinar"."webinar_type" AS "webinar_type",
  "public"."webinar"."courseId" AS "courseId",
  "public"."webinar"."tagline_1" AS "tagline_1",
  "public"."webinar"."tagline_2" AS "tagline_2",
  "public"."webinar"."about" AS "about",
  "public"."webinar"."text_highlight" AS "text_highlight",
  "public"."webinar"."what_you_learn" AS "what_you_learn",
  "public"."webinar"."acc_city_id" AS "acc_city_id",
  "public"."webinar"."isOffline" AS "isOffline",
  "public"."webinar"."card_banner_image" AS "card_banner_image",
  "public"."webinar"."date_time" AS "date_time",
  "public"."webinar"."zoomAccount" AS "zoomAccount"
FROM
  "public"."webinar"
WHERE
  (
    "public"."webinar"."date_time" >= CAST((NOW() + INTERVAL '1 day') AS date)
  )
 
   AND (
    "public"."webinar"."date_time" < CAST((NOW() + INTERVAL '14 day') AS date)
  )

SELECT
  "public"."lead"."id" AS "id",
  "public"."lead"."candidate_id" AS "candidate_id",
  "public"."lead"."first_name" AS "first_name",
  "Phone"."phoneNumber" AS "Phone__phoneNumber",
  "Phone"."countryCode" AS "Phone__countryCode",
  "Email"."email" AS "Email__email"
FROM
  "public"."lead"
LEFT JOIN "public"."phone" AS "Phone" ON "public"."lead"."id" = "Phone"."leadId"
LEFT JOIN "public"."email" AS "Email" ON "public"."lead"."id" = "Email"."leadId"
LEFT JOIN "public"."user" AS "User - SpocId" ON "public"."lead"."spocId" = "User - SpocId"."id"
WHERE
  "Phone"."phoneNumber" = '{{ $json.phone }}'
  OR "Email"."email" = '{{ $json.email }}'
